name: Hard 4.12 "Fools and Their Money" Quiz / Test | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What day of the week did Diane say it was?
questions.explanation:
Sunday.

	Diane commented on how Sunday was nothing but football and people drinking beer. Diane did not like football at all.

questions.text: What word did Frasier tell Diane she used too much?
questions.explanation:
really.

	Frasier was still upset that Diane dumped him so he was nitpicking at everything she said. Diane told him if that's the only reason he came to the bar, perhaps he should go to another bar.

Woody.

	Woody had won three weeks in a row. This particular week he won $75.

questions.text: What was Paul's system for betting on the games?
questions.correct: Bets opposites of what Norm bets
options: Picks the teams with the best mascot
questions.explanation:
Bets opposites of what Norm bets.

	Paul came in 2nd place in the pool that particular week. He won $25.

questions.text: How much did Woody want to bet with the bookie?
questions.explanation:
$1000.

	Woody had never bet with a bookie so he wanted to try it, and $1000 was his life savings. The others pick on his choices because he picked all long shots.

questions.text: Who kept getting on Diane about her speaking?
questions.correct: Frasier & Frasier Crane & Crane & Dr Crane & Dr Frasier Crane
questions.explanation:
Frasier & Frasier Crane & Crane & Dr Crane & Dr Frasier Crane.

	Frasier commented to the guys that "Diane had made 17 errors in the area of grammar, etiquette and statement of fact."  Diane replied by telling him, that he "sucked eggs".

questions.text: What did Woody have in his shoe?
questions.explanation:
a map.

	Woody kept a map of the money he had buried in his backyard. The others thought he kept his money in his shoe.

He never played Woody's bet.

	Sam was trying to protect Woody by not placing the bet. Unfortunately, his plan backfired and Woody won (or should have won) $10,000.

questions.text: What was Woody's first reaction when Sam told him the mistake he made?
questions.explanation:
He thanked Sam.

	Woody was not angry with Sam because he was touched that Sam thought enough of him to want to protect him. Sam told Woody he should be angry because Sam felt guilty about it and wanted Woody to get angry.

questions.text: What song do Woody and Sam sing together?
questions.explanation:
Home on the Range.

	Sam said it was an old trick that he learned from Coach. Coach said that no one can sing "Home on the Range" together for 30 minutes and still stay mad.
